string-array.name: what_list
string-array.item: What is the scariest thing you have done for fun?
What was in your high school locker?
What is your real favorite movie?
What movie do you pretend is your favorite to sound cultured?
What is in the trunk of your car right now?
What is the best gift anyone\'s ever given you?
What is the best piece of advice you have ever been given?
What is your favorite item you've bought this year?
What would be the most surprising scientific discovery imaginable?
What is your absolute dream job?
What did you eat for breakfast?
What is your most used emoji?
What was the worst style choice you ever made?
What was the worst haircut you ever had?
What would your dream house be like?

string-array.name: who_list
string-array.item: Who do you admire the most?
Who is your favorite actor?
Who is your favorite fictional character?
Who is the better businessman or business woman and why?
Who was your childhood actor/actress crush?
Who was the worst grade-school teacher you ever had?
Who is your craziest/most interesting relative?
Who is your celebrity look-alike?

string-array.name: when_list
string-array.item: When you die, what do you want to be remembered for?
When is the most interesting period in history?
When it comes to fixing things,how handy are you?
When nobody else is listening, what are your favorite songs from your teenage years that you still rock out?
When you wake up in the morning, what is the first thing you think of?
When did you first notice that you were already an adult?

string-array.name: why_list
string-array.item: Do you think you rely too heavily on your phone? Why or why not?
Do you prefer pens or pencils? Why?
Why are you here today?
Visit any planet, which one would you choose and why?

string-array.name: where_list
string-array.item: Where do you keep your books?
Where do you buy your dresses?
Where is the most interesting place you have been?
Where do you go shopping for Christmas?
Are you traveling for Christmas? If so, where to?
Where is the last place you would be caught dead?
Where do you want to travel in the future

string-array.name: If_list
string-array.item: If you had a million dollars, what would you do?
If you could live anywhere, where would you live?
If you could be an animal, which one would you be?
If you could hang out with any cartoon character, who would you choose and why?
If you could live anywhere in the world for a year, where would it be?
If you could commit any crime and get away with it what would you choose and why?
If you could choose any person from history to be your imaginary friend, who would it be and why?
If you could see one movie again for the first time, what would it be and why?
If you could bring back any fashion trend what would it be?
If you could live in any country, where would you live?
If you could choose any two famous people to have dinner with who would they be?
If you could rename yourself, what name would you pick?
ou could have someone follow you around all the time, like a personal assistant, what would you have them do?
If you had to teach a class on one thing, what would you teach?
If you could magically become fluent in any language, what would it be?
If you could be immortal, what age would you choose to stop aging at and why?
If you could be on a reality TV show, which one would you choose and why?
If you could choose any person from history to be your imaginary friend, who would it be and why?
If you could go to Mars, would you? Why or why not?
If you could have the power of teleportation right now, where would you go and why?
If you could write a book that was guaranteed to be a best seller, what would you write?

resources.string: If you lose, say something interesting about yourself!
